recipesJson.name: Shmores my way
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: Inspired by Shmores recipe by Germygermygerm. Used tfa toasted marshmallow and fw graham cracker for a more graham-y taste.

reviews.text: I loved this mix.  Tons of fluffy mouthfeel, rich chocolate, and just enough graham flavor to know it's in there.  I did sub tfa marshmallow for pur, but I don't think it really hurt the recipe
